data.eml:eml: Cryptic species diversity in polypores: the Skeletocutisnivea species complex

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Korhonen, Aku, Seelan, Jaya Seelan Sathiya, Miettinen, Otto (2018): Cryptic species diversity in polypores: the Skeletocutisnivea species complex. MycoKeys 36: 45-82, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.36.27002, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.36.27002
